ChunkText: if it is approved, your h-1b status does not actually take effect until october 1. two ways to change to h-1b: change of status and consular processing change of status means the petition is asking to change your status to h-1b in the us, without leaving the country.
ContextBefore: second, if you are selected, your employer can then submit a complete h-1b petition for you within 90 days. your employer will receive a receipt for you after submitting the complete h-1b petition. third, after being receipted, your application is eventually reviewed and a decision is made.
ContextAfter: consular processing means the change to h-1b will only take place after the h-1b is approved and the person leaves the us, applies for an h-1b visa, and returns to the US with the h-1b visa.
